::Spears::

She glared at Striker.
"Why is it that every time you tell me not to worry, something goes 
wrong." She stood up and puther hand on the ceiling to stablize 
herself.  "OK, what's wrong with it?"  She very slowly walked forward 
to the console and looked at it.  "Is it the power core or the energy 
extracters?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker smiles at Spears. "Calm down. We're perfectly safe. Falling 
is very 
> unlikely."
> 
> Right as he finishes saying this, the pod begins to shake, the 
energy level 
> too low to retain its altitude.
> 
> "Warning. Altitude decresing at alarming rate. Falure to slow down 
will 
> result in crash."
> 
> Striker sighs, walking over to a console and pushing a few buttons 
to try and 
> stabolize the pod.
